questions.question: What are the main ingredients of the dish?
questions.answer: eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper
questions.reference: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

questions.question: How is the creamy sauce created?
questions.answer: by mixing pancetta with the pasta, eggs, and cheese
questions.reference: To make it, you cook the pancetta in a pan, then mix it with the pasta, eggs, and cheese to create a creamy sauce.

questions.question: What is the dish served with on top?
questions.reference: The dish is typically served with a sprinkle of black pepper on top.
